review: I was accessing  Amazon Prime and Netflix through my DVD player. It was terribly slow and cumbersome.  The Fire TV stick has made all the difference in the world. It is so much easier to get to Prime shows and the other apps. Great item.

review: I have had the Fire TV Stick for about 2 weeks and so far, I have no complaints. The Fire TV Stick remote is a big help and combined with the fact that your smartphone or tablet could double up as an alternate remote makes this product even better.Setup was a breeze and I was up and running in under 5 minutes. I predominantly use this for Netflix in my exercise room.Good Product!
